soooooo stupid!!

so...last night.
i was so bored...nufin 2 do.

and i dnt sleep so gud...so i was awake.

and after coloring in(sumfin i aint done since primary skool)
sketching
cleaning my room
and doing my nails...

i decided 2 pierce my eyebrow.
it didnt auctally hurt...
there was lil blood.
but it didnt wrk.
i couldnt get the ring in.

so i mite do it l8r.
.
.
.
.
.
.
then after that...i went 2 bed with a heavy headache
and nearly passing out n a lil bit dizzy.

id prob do it again.
